item.title: Ball X Pit Regal Update Release Window & What To Expect
item.content:encoded:
No one saw the success of Ball X Pit coming. It’s a big win for Kenny Sun and Devolver Digital that the ball-bouncing title has been such a success, and to celebrate this achievement, the first free expansion is on the way—the Regal Update due for release.

The name doesn’t give much away, but in essence, you descend deeper into a pit and use an assortment of balls to bat away foes and bring home resources and success. The deeper you delve, the harder it gets, and the formula has been a rip-roaring success. Ball X Pit has cleared 1 million in sales (and counting), and it’s just getting started.

Time to find out what’s known about the Regal Update.

When Is Ball X Pit Regal Update Coming Out?

January 2026 is the launch window for the Ball X Pit Regal Update, and while the exact date isn’t known, this is confirmed to be the release window for the Regal update.

A post on the Ball X Pit X page was posted on January 7 to reassure game owners about the first proper new content:

“We’re back at full speed for our first free DLC release this month! More details are coming soon, but for now, we can confirm it will bring features many of you have been asking for since launch.”

It’s January 8, as of writing, which means there shouldn’t be too many more days now between the debut of the update. Stay tuned for further updates and details on its arrival.

What’s Included With Ball X Pit Regal Update?

Kenny Sun hasn’t specified exact details for the Regal Update, but it promises community-driven features and at least two new characters.

A general outlook on incoming features was revealed in the BALL x PIT Roadmap 2026 video. Updates include the following:

  • New Balls
  • New Evolutions
  • New Buildings
  • New Characters

There will be stuff in addition to this. It’s not made clear if all of these will appear in every update.

Ball X Pit came out of left field to be one of the year’s best and most fun indie games. Do you think we’ll see any more updates after the initial three? What could a sequel improve upon? Give some feedback through the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

If you haven’t already, please check out the complete Ball X Pit Trophy List and whether it’s on Xbox Game Pass or PlayStation Plus.

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1665: Hints and Answer for January 9, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1665 for January 9, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, January 9, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1665 will likely give you a challenge. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4.3 of 6 guesses. That makes it tougher than the 4.3-guess average from January 8.

General Wordle Hints For January 9

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word can function as both a number and part of many compound phrases.
  • Hint 2: It’s frequently used when describing time, position, or order.
  • Hint 3: You’ll often see this word paired with units or measurements.
  • Hint 4: It commonly appears in expressions that suggest something is just past the middle.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1665 for January 9, 2026.

Starter Words For January 9, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • WEIGH
  • THING
  • HEIST
  • SIGHT

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1665 On January 9, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: EIGHT

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

EIGHT is a noun. It’s “the cardinal number that is the sum of one and seven and the product of two and four.” It’s also a homophone for the word “ate”.

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1664 on January 8, 2026

Answer: BLAST

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1665?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on January 10 will be Wordle Game #1666.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

item.title: Switch 2’s First Holiday Sales Fail to Match Original Console
item.content:encoded:
A new report reveals that the Nintendo Switch 2 failed to match the original console’s sales during the first holiday period.

The Nintendo Switch 2 has been going strong in sales since its release, helping boost hardware sales across multiple months. The new console also reached a sales milestone of 10 million units in November 2025; however, it seems things have been declining since then.

Switch 2 Sales Fall Over First Holiday Period

A report by The Game Business reveals that Switch 2 sales have slowed during the holiday period, with the change more evident in Western markets. The Switch 2 fell short by 35% in the United States when compared to the original Switch in the same period in 2017. The situation is somewhat similar in Europe, with sales of the new console 16% lower than those of the previous one in the same period in the UK. However, overall Switch 2 sales in the UK were 6% higher than Switch 1’s.

A senior Nintendo employee revealed that a “complicated economic landscape” and “the absence of a major Western game” make it tough to compare the Switch to the original Switch; however, the team is happy with the overall performance. Moreover, sales were down in Japan during the holiday period as well, with the Switch 1 selling 1.39 million units during its first holiday period and the Switch 2 selling 1.32 million. When taking the whole year into account in Japan, Switch 2 sales were up 11% compared to the original console.

In other news, here are the nine biggest Switch and Switch 2 games releasing this year. Additionally, the PlayStation 5 beat the Switch 2 in US hardware sales in November 2025. What are your thoughts on Switch 2’s first holiday sales failing to match the original console? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Netflix’s The Witcher series ending in 2026. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: HLTV Awards 2026—Nominations, Stream Time, and Where to Watch
item.content:encoded:
This year’s HLTV Awards are fast approaching, and Counter-Strike fans everywhere are setting up to settle in and enjoy the ceremony. It’s one of the most prestigious award showcases in the esports world, and it’s set to recognize everyone from on-air talent to the players themselves.

Below, we’ve outlined everything you need to know about the HLTV Awards 2026, from the nominations and potential award winners to how best to watch the stream unfold.

If you’re wondering when the HLTV Awards 2026 is, read on.

HLTV Awards 2026 Schedule

The HLTV Awards 2026 will commence on January 10 at 18:00 CET / 12:00 EST / 17:00 GMT. It’s being hosted at the Blue Hall of the Sava Centar in Belgrade, Serbia, and it promises to feature the names and faces of some of the biggest personalities in esports.

Typically, the main show runs for around two to three hours, often with a pre-show event that can make the runtime stretch a little further. Depending on how long acceptance speeches and entertainment segments are, it could be shorter or longer, so prepare accordingly!

This year’s event is being presented by 1xBet and will run parallel to the HLTV Awards Conference, hosted by GRID, a data and analytics company specializing in the esports industry.

HLTV Awards 2026 Nominations

There are so many deserving nominees at this year’s HLTV Awards, and here’s the full spread.

Awards Chosen by Panel:

  • Closer of the Year
    • David “frozen” Čerňanský
    • Kaike “KSCERATO” Cerato
    • Robin “ropz” Kool
  • Anchor of the Year
    • Valeriy “b1t” Vakhovskiy
    • Nikita “HeavyGod” Martynenko
    • William “mezii” Merriman
  • IGL of the Year
    • Dan “apEX” Madesclaire
    • Garidmagnai “bLitz” Byambasuren
    • Gabriel “FalleN” Toledo
  • AWPer of the Year
    • Ilya “m0NESY” Osipov
    • Dmitry “sh1ro” Sokolov
    • Mathieu “ZywOo” Herbaut
  • Opener of the Year
    • Danil “donk” Kryshkovets
    • Shahar “flameZ” Shushan
    • Mareks “YEKINDAR” Gaļinskis
  • Coach of the Year
    • Sergey “hally” Shavaev
    • Erdenedalai “maaRaa” Bayanbat
    • Rémy “XTQZZZ” Quoniam
  • Highlight of the Year
    • donk – 1v5 vs Vitality
    • ropz – 2 second Ace vs 3DMAX
    • Twistzz – 4K (1v3) vs NAVI

Awards Chosen by Community:

  • Talent of the Year
    • Freya “⁠Freya⁠” Spiers
    • Chad “⁠SPUNJ⁠” Burchill
    • James “⁠BanKs⁠” Banks
  • Streamer of the Year
    • Vadim “⁠Evelone192⁠” Kozakov
    • Erik “⁠fl0m⁠” Flom
    • Mark “⁠ohnePixel⁠” Zimmermann
  • Creator of the Year
    • dima_aimbots
    • NadeKing
    • Virre CS2
  • Event of the Year
    • BLAST.tv Austin Major
    • IEM Cologne 2025
    • StarLadder Budapest Major
  • Skin of the Year
    • AWP | Printstream (JTPNZ)
    • Glock-18 | Shinobu (Horameow)
    • M4A4 | Full Throttle (dwern)

HLTV Awards

  • Women’s Player of the Year
    • Mayline-Joy “⁠ASTRA⁠” Champliaud
    • Bruna “⁠bizinha⁠” Marvila
    • Wiktoria “⁠vicu⁠” Janicka
  • Women’s Team of The Year
    • BIG EQUIPA
    • FURIA fe
    • MIBR fe
  • Rookie of the Year
    • Maxim “⁠kyousuke⁠” Lukin
    • Drin “⁠makazze⁠” Shaqiri
    • Danil “⁠molodoy⁠” Golubenko
  • Team of the Year
    • MOUZ
    • Spirit
    • Vitality
  • Player of the Year
    • TBA

How to Watch HLTV Awards 2026

The easiest way to watch the HLTV Awards 2026 broadcast is to tune into the official channel on Twitch:

  • HLTV on Twitch

Otherwise, your favorite creators and pro players (who aren’t attending the event in person) will likely be hosting watch parties for the ceremony.

Let us know on the Insider Gaming Discord server who you have winning Player of the Year.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that SlasheR has retired from COD esports

item.title: Netflix’s The Witcher Series Will End in 2026
item.content:encoded:
Netflix’s new post has confirmed that 2026 is the year in which The Witcher series comes to an end.

We were informed back in 2024 that Netflix’s The Witcher series would be renewed for its fifth and final season. Now that the fourth season has aired and the fifth season has been filmed, all we need to wait for is the last season to air. Netflix has confirmed that the fifth season will end its run in 2026.

The Witcher’s Season 5 Will End in 2026, Bringing the Series to a Close

The confirmation that The Witcher series will end in 2026 comes from a Tudum post by Netflix, which talks about all the content releasing this year. The summary states that “the time of the end is nigh,” and that dark forces will be coming together across the continent to target Ciri. If Geralt and Yennefer wish to save their daughter and reunite as a family, they will have to face never-before-seen obstacles and enemies. The fifth and final season of the show will air in 2026.

The Witcher series is highly revered in the fan base, even after going through a major recasting with Henry Cavill exiting for Liam Hemsworth to take his place. The actress who plays Ciri in the series also recently stated that she had considered leaving, along with Cavill. Still, she ultimately decided to return and take Henry’s role as “knowledgeable and loyal to the books,” as well as pushing for “certain lines to be included.” Even amid these twists and turns, the series has remained strong, and now fans are eagerly awaiting its epic conclusion.

In other news, check out Liam Hemsworth addressing the Witcher casting doubt. Additionally, Yennefer’s voice actor had no idea who she played in The Witcher 3. What are your thoughts on Netflix’s The Witcher series ending in 2026? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about PlayStation 2’s CPU being so overpowered that it caused military concerns. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
